Package sensors

Sensors, this contains all sensor type classes that are used in system

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FireSensor
    It contains functionality for alerting users when fire occurred
    HumiditySensor
    It contains functionality for humidity
    MoistureSensor
    It contains functionality for moisture level in soil
    PestSensor
    It contains functionality for identify pest in garden
    RainSensor
    It contains functionality for identify whether it is raining or not
    Sensor
    Sensor super class for sensors
    SoilSensor
    It contains functionality for PH value of soil
    TemperatureSensor
    It contains functionality for temperature in garden/zone

Package sensors Description

Sensors, this contains all sensor type classes that are used in system
